testCases.query: Create a NotebookLM notebook for my auth refactor project, add the OAuth 2.1 spec as a source, and query it for key differences from OAuth 2.0
expectedBehavior: Claude calls notebook_create with a descriptive title
Calls source_add with source_type=url for the OAuth spec URL
Calls notebook_query with the comparison question
Follows the correct order: create -> add source -> query

testCases.query: Generate an audio overview podcast from my notebook but the session expired
expectedBehavior: Claude detects auth expiry concern and suggests running nlm login --check
Advises re-authenticating with nlm login before proceeding
Explains that sessions last approximately 20 minutes
After re-auth, calls studio_create with artifact_type=audio and polls studio_status

expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke any NotebookLM MCP tools
No references to notebooks, sources, or studio content generation
